property.name: browser.fullName
property.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/538.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) PhantomJS/2.1.1 Safari/538.1

testcase.name: should compile as an image tag
should have a class of test_sprite
should log an error when you dont specify a sprite
should not log an error when you specify a sprite
should log an error when you dont specify an alt tag
should not log an error when you specify an alt tag
should not show an error when align is not specified
